text: Gérard Farison (15 March 1944 – 8 September 2021) was a French footballer. He played as a defender. Farison was born in Saint-Étienne, France. His playing career lasted from 1968 until 1983. He played for the national team in 1976. Farison died on 8 September 2021 in Saint-Raphaël, France at the age of 77.Gérard Farison, l'ancien joueur de l'AS Saint-Etienne, est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== *federation official site *Profile Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Auvergne- Rhône-Alpes Category:French football managers Category:People from Saint- Étienne
title: Gérard Farison
